original_title: Second coconut triangle to be started in Northern Province: Minister
original_body_lines: The second coconut triangle will be started in the Northern Province this year on the President's directive, coinciding with World Coconut Day on September 2nd, Plantation Minister Dr. Ramesh Pathirana said today.
Addressing the media briefing held at the PMC, he said the initiative will be centred around Jaffna, Mannar and Mulaithivu Districts, President's Media Division (PMD) said.
